water tank Fiona
always keeps her water tank full so that

she has plenty of water that's ready to

Fiona uses her hose to spray water onto

wheels when Fiona's loaded up with water

she's very heavy she has six sets of

ladders the fire crew can use these to
help them reach fires that are in taller

buildings they can rescue people from

trees carefully this is where the driver

Fiona is zooming to an emergency

siren and flashing lights to tell other

they can get to the emergency quickly
thanks to Fiona for helping us out today

I hope you enjoyed finding out about
